definitions.definition: used to emphasize that there is a large number or amount of something

examples.text: mile upon mile of dusty road

definitions.definition: used, especially at the beginning of stories, to mean ‘a long time ago in the past’

examples.text: Once upon a time there was a beautiful princess.

definitions.definition: if something in the future is almost upon you, it is going to arrive or happen very soon

examples.text: The summer season was almost upon them again.

wordOrigin: Middle English: from up + on, suggested by Old Norse upp á.
